actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A resolution to prohibit the utilization by House caucuses of House office space, clerk-hire allowances, allowances for official expenses, and outside contributions.

summary.text: Prohibits House caucuses, except the House Republican Conference and the House Democratic Caucus, from using House office space, equipment, the clerk-hire allowance or the allowance for official expenses, and from receiving outside contributions after January 3, 1982.

titles.title: A resolution to prohibit the utilization by House caucuses of House office space, clerk-hire allowances, allowances for official expenses, and outside contributions.
